content: yes it s crocheted with a classic ribbed brim leading into a beautiful honeycomb design and topped with a faux-fur or yarn pom pom this toque pattern is a new classic to add to your collection the remington diamond cable crochet hat pattern is an easy one to follow perfect for intermediate crocheters but creates an intricate and complex looking design the toque can be made into 4 different sizes using this pattern baby toddler child or adult so you can crochet a hat for the whole family using red heart® soft® a medium weight yarn created a cozy and soft beanie before for those cold fall & winter months please note that this is an ad-free detailed pdf version of a pattern that can be found for free at www lakesideloops com/remington i**n an effort to make our pattern as convenient and easy to read as possible the pattern includes ** written pattern in english us terms pictures chart video tutorial *all patterns and photographs are the property of lakeside loops©* **all finished products from our patterns may be used for local sales and sold online ** thank you for looking kind wishes kimberley - lakeside loops www lakesideloops com
